p: The major part of captured adults was pooled (≤10 individuals each) according to species, sampling locality and date, and subsequently homogenized in 250–1000 µL of L-15 culture medium by using the Precellys 24 ® tissue homogenizer in bead tubes. Homogenates were kept at −80°C for posterior viral genome detection. Only non-blood-fed mosquitoes were analyzed.
